SELECT b.id, b.building_code, b.building_name, b.status, b.remark, COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) AS floorCount, COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) AS roomCount, COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) AS deviceCount FROM building b LEFT JOIN floor f ON f.building_id = b.id AND f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN room r ON r.building_id = b.id AND r.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN device d ON d.device_room = r.id AND d.is_deleted = 0
b.is_deleted = 0
AND building_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParams.buildingCode}, '%')
AND building_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParams.buildingName}, '%')
AND status = #{queryParams.status}
GROUP BY b.id
